objects.text: No chemicals • Cold-pressed • Deep conditioning • Multi-purpose

product_details.name: Parachute 100% Pure Coconut Oil - Premium Quality Hair & Skin Care Essential
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure and Natural Coconut Oil
• Versatile beauty essential for hair and skin care
• No chemicals, preservatives, or additives
• Ideal for hair moisturizing and deep conditioning
• Perfect for traditional oil massage and skin care
• Helps in maintaining healthy scalp and reducing dandruff
• Cold-pressed extraction method preserves natural nutrients
• Multi-purpose oil suitable for cooking and beauty care
• Comes in a convenient blue bottle with easy-pour design
• Trusted brand with legacy of quality coconut oil products

banner_details:
This banner features a vertically centered product advertisement with a fresh and clean aesthetic. The background is a smooth gradient transitioning from dark blue (#00334e) to a rich azure blue (#005792), enhanced with soft, semi-transparent white circles and curved wave shapes in greenish hues at the bottom. At the center stands a mid-sized product image ("product_image") of a blue coconut oil bottle. 

The heading ("heading") is bold and all-caps in white, followed by a soft yellow subheading ("subheading") styled in a serif font. Below the product, a tagline ("description") lists features in bullet-separated text, in white bold lettering. Near the bottom, a large price tag ("price") in white stands out against the pastel green curved base. A rectangular button ("cta_background") with light yellow fill contains a bold call-to-action text ("cta") in navy blue.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #00334e
- Azure Blue: #005792
- Soft Yellow: #f0f3bd
- Teal Green: #00a896
- White: #FFFFFF
- Navy Text: #00334e
product_color: The product image features a bold, vibrant blue bottle (#005BBB) which dominates the visual appeal, symbolizing trust and freshness. The white accents used in the text and logo elements (#FFFFFF) create high readability and a clean contrast. A rich green (#3A9D23) outlines the logo, blending well with the overall blue tone while adding a natural, organic touch relevant to the coconut oil. The smooth gradient of blue adds depth without distracting from the core branding. For an advertisement banner, use this core palette: vibrant blue (#005BBB), white (#FFFFFF), and fresh green (#3A9D23), maintaining clarity and brand recognition throughout the design.
